title: Representation of a normalized element
description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized

type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

website.description: The website which the referenced id belongs to. Currently supported only for sections.

referent_properties.description: An object for key-value pairs that should override the values of keys with the same name in the denormalized object

..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..title: Has additional properties
..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.

..\\traits\\trait_id.json.title: Globally Unique ID trait
..\\traits\\trait_id.json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.

..\\traits\\trait_subtype.json.title: Subtype or Template
..\\traits\\trait_subtype.json.description: A user-defined categorization method to supplement type. In Arc, this field is reserved for organization-defined purposes, such as selecting the PageBuilder template that should be used to render a document.

..\\traits\\trait_channel.json.title: Channel trait
..\\traits\\trait_channel.json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible

..\\traits\\trait_alignment.json.title: Alignment
..\\traits\\trait_alignment.json.description: A property used to determine horizontal positioning of a content element relative to the elements that immediately follow it in the element sequence.
